code: import axios from'axios';var EMPLOYEE_API_BASE_URL="http://localhost:9999/api/v1/employees";export var getEmployees=function getEmployees(){return axios.get(EMPLOYEE_API_BASE_URL);};export var createEmployee=function createEmployee(employee){return axios.post(EMPLOYEE_API_BASE_URL,employee);};export function getEmployeeById(employeeId){return axios.get("".concat(EMPLOYEE_API_BASE_URL,"/").concat(employeeId));}export function updateEmployee(employee,employeeId){return axios.put("".concat(EMPLOYEE_API_BASE_URL,"/").concat(employeeId),employee);}export function deleteEmployeeById(employeeId){return axios.delete("".concat(EMPLOYEE_API_BASE_URL,"/").concat(employeeId));}
